A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie does not fit into the Star Wars universe. You leaving this film knowing nothing more about the characters and plot than when you went it. Some of the most important chacarters in this new trilogy and forgettable throw away characters that have been fabricated to just reboot a franchise and serve no other purpose. This saga was complete after VI. This new trilogy should have been set before Episode I or just stand alone films. I don't even care about Episode IX now.
